$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: The Forest Hills School District will be closed until further notice. Our first concern is for our students, staff, and community to remain calm and prepare for this unforeseen circumstance. We will be communicating via social media outlets and the website to keep you informed. (Please click on the headline for the latest update.)

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus Update

div.p: Please click on the headline to see the Forest Hills School District's Continuity of Education Plan.

a.title: Go to comments for Continuity of Education

div.p: Please click on the headline to access the "Student Device Help Desk" along with other important technology related information.

a.title: Go to comments for Technology Resources

div.p: The Forest Hills School District recognizes there may be a need to distribute food to families during this period of uncertainty. Starting Wednesday, March 18, 2020, the Forest Hills School District will be offering grab-and-go meals for students. (Please click on the headline for more information.)

a.title: Go to comments for Grab & Go Meals

div.p: Please click on the headline for the latest Coronavirus resources.

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus Resources

div.p: Please click on the headline for a list of academic online resources.

a.title: Go to comments for Academic Online Resources

div.p: Follow the Forest Hills School District on Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube. (Please click on the headline to access the links.)

a.title: Go to comments for FH Social Media
